statementlist.statement: select id, student_id, subject_id, from_year, to_year from languageskill
insert into languageskill (student_id, subject_id, from_year, to_year) values (:student_id, :subject_id, :from_year, :to_year)
select id, student_id, subject_id, from_year, to_year from languageskill where student_id = :student_id
update languageskill set student_id = :student_id, subject_id = :subject_id, from_year = :from_year, to_year = :to_year where id = :id
